title: Indiabulls Housing Finance moves NCLT against Subhash Chandra to recover loans - Economic Times
content: Indiabulls Housing Finance moves NCLT against Subhash Chandra to recover loans  Economic Times
description: It has claimed that Chandra provided a guarantee for a loan to Gnex Projects that obtained a Rs 190 crore loan from Indiabulls Housing Finance in September 2020 alongwith Essel Home, which was the co-borrower, the sources said.
